marinovhome.title: Copper Helmet - Large
marinovhome.description: Elevate your decor with our stunning Copper Helmet. Handcrafted to perfection, this exquisite piece combines artistry and heritage. Its lustrous surface and intricate detailing add a touch of timeless elegance to any space. A captivating blend of craftsmanship and style, this copper helmet is a statement piece that exudes sophistication.

caretips.tiptext: Wipe with a soft, lint-free cloth to prevent buildup.
Use mild soap and warm water; avoid abrasive tools.
Embrace natural tarnish for an aged look or polish for shine.
Embrace natural tarnish for an aged look or polish for shine.
Dry thoroughly after exposure to water.
Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunligh.
Avoid bleach and abrasive cleaners.

marinovjewelry.title: Copper Spiral & White Beads Earrings
marinovjewelry.description: Blending modern style with classic elegance, we introduce our Copper Spiral and White Beads Earrings. Crafted with precision, these earrings feature gracefully coiled copper spirals, adding a touch of contemporary flair. The pristine white beads suspended within the spirals bring a clean and timeless aesthetic to the design. Elevate your look with this understated yet captivating accessory, perfect for both casual and formal occasions.

caretips.tiptext: Copper can tarnish when exposed to moisture. Remove your earrings before swimming, showering, or participating in activities that may involve water.
Store your earrings in a dry place, away from humidity. Consider keeping them in a jewelry box or airtight container to prevent tarnishing.
To maintain the shine of the copper, clean the earrings regularly with a soft, dry cloth. You can also use a jewelry polishing cloth specifically designed for copper.

Keep your earrings away from chemicals such as perfumes, lotions, and hairsprays, as these can accelerate tarnishing. Put on your earrings after applying these products. Gentle Handling: Handle your earrings with care to prevent bending or misshaping of the copper wire. Avoid dropping them on hard surfaces.
